title: coupable
author: coupable
content: I am looking for $30 in btc and i will send $32 in usdt using binance internal transfer.Please check btc rate in preev and send $30 equivalent to: bc1q02tf2cd2rdn2hsaxmz02xd5rtl9w3jyvsd0jm9Then pm me the transaction hash with your usdt tron trc20 address (no problem if it's not a binance address) or just post here if you don't mind posting your address in public.I am in urgent need for this amount in BTC and the withdrawal fees in binance is so high in btc. I consider this as a kind act from you and a real exchange deal. I would consider tips for this address.Thank You

comments.author: frogx
comments.body: Quote from: coupable on August 08, 2023, 04:34:01 PMI am looking for $30 in btc and i will send $32 in usdt using binance internal transfer.Please check btc rate in preev and send $30 equivalent to: bc1q02tf2cd2rdn2hsaxmz02xd5rtl9w3jyvsd0jm9Then pm me the transaction hash with your usdt tron trc20 address (no problem if it's not a binance address) or just post here if you don't mind posting your address in public.I am in urgent need for this amount in BTC and the withdrawal fees in binance is so high in btc. I consider this as a kind act from you and a real exchange deal. I would consider tips for this address.Thank YouDo you still need this?

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: frogx on August 11, 2023, 01:07:26 AMDo you still need this?According to the address transaction history, he hasn't received the BTC he needed yet, but I might be better you first inquire from him via PM before you send him any Bitcoins.@coupable in case you still need the bitcoins, I could send them to you, but my USDT address is on another exchange and not Binance. If you don't mind, just give me a go ahead.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: frogx on August 11, 2023, 01:07:26 AMDo you still need this?Quote from: logfiles on August 11, 2023, 08:00:59 PMQuote from: frogx on August 11, 2023, 01:07:26 AMDo you still need this?@coupable in case you still need the bitcoins, I could send them to you, but my USDT address is on another exchange and not Binance. If you don't mind, just give me a go ahead.Thank you for your interest in trying to help me. In fact, I needed that amount of bitcoin two days ago to be able to try the mixinsafe app as part of the review campaign that has been launched a while ago, and I was surprised that the fees for withdrawing bitcoins from Binance cost a lot, so I thought of doing the exchange here on the forum. Unfortunately, I did not receive a response from anyone at the same time that my phone screen was damaged, so I got an extension in the review preparation period to the 15th of this month. Tomorrow I will receive my weekly payment from the signature campaign of which I am a member, and this will enable me to complete what I have been going through.Thank you once again for your concern, and I will not hesitate again to ask one of you for help if I need it in the future. I will close this topic now.

comments.author: coupable

If you don't mind, just give me a go ahead.I sent you a pm last night. Check your inbox please if you are still interested to help me. Thanks
